General.Name: Critical Metals Corp. Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Critical Metals Corp. operates as a mining exploration and development company. It explores for lithium and rare earth element deposits. The company is based in New York, New York. Critical Metals Corp. operates as a subsidiary of European Lithium Limited.
